content: In which US state would you find Mount Rushmore National Memorial?

Mount Rushmore National Memorial is located in the Black Hills region of South Dakota, USA. The monument features the carved faces of four former United States presidents: George Washington, Thomas Jefferson, Theodore Roosevelt, and Abraham Lincoln. It was created by sculptor Gutzon Borglum and his son, Lincoln Borglum, over a period of 14 years, from 1927 to 1941. Today, Mount Rushmore attracts millions of visitors each year and is considered one of the most iconic symbols of American history and culture.
